name: offline-favourites
description: Prototype for linking DHIS2 favourites with excel templates.

scripts.build: rm -r build; mkdir build; browserify scripts.js -o build/bundle.js; cp index.html build/;
scripts.package: rm app.zip; npm run build; cp manifest.webapp build/; cd build; zip -R ../app.zip *;
scripts.play: npm run package; curl -X DELETE -u admin:district https://play.dhis2.org/2.33.1/api/apps/Offline-Analytics-Helper; curl -X POST -u admin:district -F file=@app.zip https://play.dhis2.org/2.33.1/api/apps

author: Olav Poppe
